title: Server issue. True Riot Quality
body:
Nice job again. It's not enough that you make the game worst playing with every singe patch, now even the game or the server is the same S#%T. With working network keeps disconnecting me every game till i couldn't even log in. Had a little time to play and i wasted my time trying to reconnect and lose every single game because i was too behind and sometimes this happened to my teammates too so they were in the same spot like me. CRAP! I'm really upset. I hope I'll get even the leave buster penalization for this, because last game couldn't reconnect anymore after **3 MINUTES PLAYING THAT MATCH**!  Yea we would love the new contents if the game would be fine, but it is NOT. Try fix the game, make it REALLY **ENJOYABLE** again, than invest in new content.
This is my true opinion about the game right now. Maybe some will share my opinion maybe not. That's it. Truth hurts and so League these days. Yea, you can say " If u don't like, don't play it" but I used to love playing this game, spending several hours each day and want that back.

replies.body:
Helló, ez a magyar fórum, kérlek írj ide magyarul.
